selection_reasoning: The selection prioritizes the high-precision 1.0 solutions (8_4, 8_0) and their most successful ancestor (6_1). Trial 11_1 is included to refine the basin-hopping approach. The goal for the next generation is to use these seeds with even tighter optimizer tolerances (ftol=1e-12) and more iterations to see if numerical precision can push the score beyond 1.0.

trial_selections.reasoning: Highest precision 1.0 solution. It uses a robust two-stage optimization (Symmetric -> Slack Variable) and serves as the best current seed.
Another 1.0 solution with a slightly different implementation of the slack-variable formulation. Provides a robust baseline for refinement.
The best result from Gen 11 (0.999998). Although slightly lower than the seed, it demonstrates that basin-hopping can maintain high-quality results if precision is improved.
The 0.9994 precursor. It is the most fertile starting basin found so far and is useful for testing new relaxation strategies that might break the 1.0 barrier.
